channel.title: Hp Scape 2006 [Staffspots open] [+ needing devloppers!]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i69.servimg.com/u/f69/18/12/63/60/coollo10.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=13pt]Welcome to the Hp Scape status page, Hp Scape is a Runescape 2006 Remake![/size][/center]
[center][b][size=10pt][img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img] [url=http://uppit.com/2hqx6eyvzga0/HpScape_2006_V4.rar]Client Download[/url] [b]|[/b] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img] [url=http://hpscape.forumotion.com/]Forums[/url] [/size][/b][/center]
[center][u][b][size=18pt]Let me introduce myself:[/size][/b][/u][/center]
I'm Axel, I'm 16 years old. I live in Belgium but i can speak English, Deutch, Dutch and French! I'm a good programmer, I've been making rsps's for 3 years!! This server needs alot of work if you feel like helping check this topic out: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600325.msg4216528.html#msg4216528
[center][u][b][size=18pt]Screenshot's:[/size][/b][/u][/center]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/raszmt.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/zwyfph.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33mo3fk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/66ertg.jpg[/img]
[size=20pt]If having any problems while logging in please reply what the client says![/size]

item.title: Hp Scape 2006 [Staffspots open] [+ needing devloppers!]
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:5, topic:488670”][quote author=ninja1377 link=topic=606903.msg4228778#msg4228778 date=1361137732]

I don’t get it…

Your banner says back to the future, but 2006 is in the past, how U do? Also if you’re going to make a banner for a 2006 server, wouldn’t it be best to only use 2006 content/images in it? As for your server, you have the wrong game frame, and were skills capes actually out in 2006?

i’m still wprking on the client, the xp rate’s van be changed in a few minutes
the server gets offline like 7 hours a day then its back online, Because i cant leave my computer on the whole night so we need people that give money to the server and so we can buy a vps. or just a hoster that hosts 24/7

Well, I got into the server… After killing men, i was level 25 in HP, attack, strength, and defence. Less then a few minutes! Not quite like the old RS06… and you’re right, not the correct client either.
[/quote]
CONFUSED ME [/quote]

Read full topic
